attributes.action: Bring back dog ownership licensing for all breeds and owners.
attributes.additional_details: Dog breeding and abandonment in the UK is out of control, on top this large numbers of rescues are also being imported. All of this is leading to negligent ownership, leading to high numbers of incidents, leading to breed specific legislation.
attributes.background: All dog owners to attend 'responsible ownership' course. Dog license for all breeds and owners. Incident register, 1 strike - listed as dangerous dog. 2 strike - muzzled in a public space. 3 Strike consideration of destruction. Bring accountability for dogs ownership.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Reintroduce the dog licence for dog owners
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/713793
